summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and prescribing fees for building, refrigeration, gas piping, engineering, mechanical, land use and environmental approvals and other certificates and permits required by ordinance, and for the furnishing of certain services and materials; amending Seattle Municipal Code ("SMC") 22.900.030, 22.900.040, 22.900.050, 22.900.060, 22.900.070, 22.900.140, 22.900.170A, 22.900.205, 22.900.220 Tables E and F, 22.900.240A, -B, -D, -E, -F, -G, -I, -J, -L and -M; and 22.900.260; adding a new subsections 22.900.220E and 22.900.220F; and adding a new section 22.900.255 relating to and prescribing fees for reviewing traffic impacts of construction and land use projects.
